section.header: You're totally goofing off, aren't you?
section.body: No. Nope. Absolutely not. Completely doing class and/or aspect related activities which contribute in a meaningful way. Yep. No doubt.

section.header: Question: are you actually doing anything productive?
section.body: Of course I am, what are you saying? I am the master of (ERROR: ASPECT NOT FOUND.), and I wont let anyone else say otherwise.
